Class VotesLogicImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.impl.VotesLogicImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VotesLogic

    @DeclareRoles(value={"ADMIN","ORGANIZER"})
public class VotesLogicImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements VotesLogic
    Session Bean implementation class VoteTest

      • submitVotes

        public void submitVotes(java.util.List<ItemTO> items,
               java.lang.String tokenValue)
                 throws VotesException
        increases the vote count for every option which is marked as voted and increases the abstentions count for every item which is marked as such. In the end the token is invalidated and it is checked if this vote was the last remaining vote so that the poll is finished.
        Specified by:
        submitVotes in interface VotesLogic
        Parameters:
        items -
        tokenValue -
        Throws:
        VotesException
